list.title: app
list.description: The app instance for serving webpage and routing data to any client. Requires no params for instantiation in the context of the server and its default settings.

list.title: io
list.description: The socket module that allows for peer-to-peer connection support.

list.title: server
list.description: The HTTP server module used for starting Spark's server to serve webpage content.

list.title: get
list.description: GET / : redirects the user to a room with an ID generated by UUID v4

list.title: start
list.description: Triggers the camera to start interacting with (or modifying) the video object based on provided options.

list.title: onResults
list.description: Sets up the onResults callback function.

list.title: setOptions
list.description: Sets other explicit configs for how the hands will detect gestures.

list.title: on
list.description: Handles what happens when a new peer uses call().

list.title: on
list.description: Handles what happens when 'user-connected' is recieved from server.

list.title: connectToNewUser
list.description: Uses peer.js to add a new peer, along with setting up the listeners for "this" client.

list.title: cors
list.description: Module for cross-origin resource sharing; needed so that the protocol default CORS policy can be overridden.

list.title: detect_fingersup
list.description: Determines how many fingers are pointing "up", using arrays to store the result.

list.title: express
list.description: Express module for starting route-based apps.

list.title: ExpressPeerServer
list.description: Module for peer.js that allows for express app support for peer-to-peer connections.

list.title: findhandpos
list.description: Helper function to determine the x-y coordinates of the positions of the hand

list.title: Gesture
list.description: Enum for the different types of gestures Spark recognizes.

list.title: muteUnmute
list.description: Toggles the mute and unmute of the video stream, along with setting the mute and unmute button by calling their defined functions.

list.title: onGestureAction
list.description: Callback for the Hands onResults event to see what gestures came out of that and how to map those gestures to certain room controls.

list.title: onResults
list.description: Determines what gesture is being shown based on the given hand detection data.

list.title: playStop
list.description: Toggles the show and hide of the video stream, along with setting the show and hide video buttons by calling their defined functions.

list.title: screenSharing
list.description: Boolean for determining if a screen is being shared or not.

list.title: screenStream
list.description: Reference object of the screen sharing video stream.

list.title: setDisableGestures
list.description: Utilizes DOM manipulation to display the disable gesture button on the gesture enable/disable button container.

list.title: setEnableGestures
list.description: Utilizes DOM manipulation to display the enable gesture button on the gesture enable/disable button container.

list.title: setMuteButton
list.description: Utilizes DOM manipulation to display the mute button on the mute/unmute button container.

list.title: setPlayVideo
list.description: Utilizes DOM manipulation to display the show video button on the video show/stop button container.

list.title: setStopVideo
list.description: Utilizes DOM manipulation to display the stop video button on the video show/stop button container.

list.title: setUnmuteButton
list.description: Utilizes DOM manipulation to display the unmute button on the mute/unmute button container.

list.title: startScreenShare
list.description: Changes your video to point to point to your screen sharing video that's prompted. If permitted, it will change your video stream to the screen sharing stream you are doing for all peers that are connected to you. If stopping screen share, see stopScreenSharing function.

list.title: stopScreenSharing
list.description: Replaces the video stream of the screen sharing to be video stream of the user who stopped the screen sharing.

list.title: toggleChat
list.description: Utilizes DOM manipulation to toggle the chat section of the room.

list.title: toggleGesture
list.description: Toggles the detection of gestures in the video stream, along with setting the enable and disable buttons by calling their defined functions.
